info.titleen: Is there any way to get it there faster?
info.titleko: 좀 더 빨리 가는 방법은 없을까요?
info.descko: 사무실에 물건을 보낼 수 있는 빠른 방법은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: I'd like to send this to our office downtown.
sentense.en_: I'd like to send this to our office downtown.
sentense.ko: 이것을 도심에 있는 우리 사무실에 보내고 싶습니다.

sentense.en: How long will it take to get it there?
sentense.en_: How long will it take to get it there?

sentense.en: Five hours? Is there any way to get it there faster?
sentense.en_: Five hours? Is there any way to get it there faster?
sentense.ko: 다섯 시간요? 좀 더 빨리 가는 방법은 없을까요?

sentense.en: Yes, we can deliver it in two hours for an extra charge.
sentense.en_: Yes, we can deliver it in two hours for an extra charge.
sentense.ko: 예, 추가 요금을 지불하면, 두 시간 안에 배달이 가능합니다.

sentense.en: Thirty dollars. But it can be more depending on the type of packaging. Is it breakable?
sentense.en_: Thirty dollars. But it can be more depending on the type of packaging. Is it breakable?
sentense.ko: 30달러요. 하지만 그것은 짐 형태에 따라 달라요. 깨지기 쉬운 건 가요?
words: 부술(깨뜨릴)수 있는, 깨지기(부서지기)쉬운, 깨지기 쉬운 것

sentense.en: Is there an extra charge for that?
sentense.en_: Is there an extra charge for that?

sentense.en: Yes, special packing is ten dollars more.
sentense.en_: Yes, special packing is ten dollars more.

sentense.en: Forty dollars all together? That's not bad.
sentense.en_: Forty dollars all together? That's not bad.
